name: EMEX.C Engine
body:
Ever since I developed an MCTS algorithm for a Uni project I've been interested in AIs that play board games.

I want to develop one to play chess but before that I need an engine. I could just use one of the many open source ones, but I think the experience of building one, specially in C++, would be worthwhile.

name: pmark.pt
body:
My personal website build with Angular. I use it to talk about whatever I feel like and serves as a way to catalog my work.

Uses a serverless API powered by Azure Functions. Retrieves data from the Nexus Mods Public API for information about my mods.

name: emexmachina.com
body:
Fake studio website.
I came up with a fake studio name for a Uni project. The website was just for fun.

name: lemis.pt
body:
Company web presence website for a former employer.
Last time I checked it was offline and they don't have any other web presence. Don't really know what's going on there.
